about_the_game:
You are tasked with servicing Terraformer Ai core. To do this you will have to blast your way through the automated defense system. Turn the bots you come across into slag and get what "res" you can out of them as you will need it to load out your tank with different weapon and mods systems.


In this demo version only the first 5 levels are available, how ever you can continue a playthrough that will repeat these 5 levels with increasing difficulty to let you play with all the different tec that would be unlocked.

All the tec that can be seen in game can be unlocked and used by Slagging the bosses on the 5 levels available. you will need to clear all 5 levels to get 1 core for one of the two core upgrades that are available. 
Tec is one time unlocked so on your next new game it will remained unlocked. you may not have the res to use it though.

If the defense systems overwhelm you and your tank gets a bit broken, you can always get another, but make sure you save enough “res” for a rebuild!

Do note that we do not intend on taking the demo down anytime soon and if we do there will be a months waring.

content_descriptors.notes: Use of weaponry to destroy other machines.
